name: Point Blank Bot
description: A Discord Bot based on discord.py for Point Blank DSCE. Powered by - @ayushk780

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: get this value from Discord Developer portal

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: should be an integer. The Disord channel id where the bot announcements will work.

Delete_after_duration.description: should be an integer. Number of seconds to wait before deleting a message.

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: should be an integer.The Disord channel id where the bot logs will work.

LOGGER_LEVEL.description: Specifies the Log level. [CRITICAL, ERROR, WARNING, INFO, and DEBUG] and if not specified defaults to WARNING
